龙鳞甲（dragon scale mail，通常缩写为DSM）是NetHack中的一类铠甲类防具。

龙鳞（dragon scales）是一种与龙鳞甲性质相似的铠甲。

两种铠甲均由龙皮制成。

生成

龙鳞和龙鳞甲均不会随机生成。但玩家可以通过许愿或骨档获取它们。

成年的龙如果被能够留下尸体的方式杀死（如果被分解，则不会留下尸体），则有1⁄3的概率掉落一块与之同色的龙鳞。利用超度魔杖或超度法术复生的龙仅有1⁄20的概率掉落龙鳞[1]。所有由龙掉落的龙鳞都是+0附魔且未诅咒的[2]。

若玩家在穿戴龙鳞时阅读非诅咒的防具附魔卷轴，且卷轴选择了龙鳞为目标，则龙鳞会被转化为同色的龙鳞甲。如果卷轴是祝福的，龙鳞甲的附魔等级+1。

在星界位面生成，且非僧侣职业的玩家怪物有1⁄9的概率获得一件随机颜色的龙鳞甲[3]。

描述

基础属性

龙鳞的基础AC加成为3，不提供MC加成，但会根据其颜色提供一项特质加成。

龙鳞甲的效果与同色的龙鳞基本相同，但基础AC加成为9。

颜色

下表展示各颜色的龙鳞和龙鳞甲对应的外在特质加成和基础价：

颜色 外在特质 基础价（龙鳞） 基础价（龙鳞甲）
蓝色（blue） 电击抵抗 500 900
黑色（black） 分解抵抗 700 1200
灰色（gray） 魔法抵抗 700 1200
绿色（green） 毒素抵抗 500 900
橙色（orange） 睡眠抵抗 500 900
红色（red） 火焰抵抗 500 900
银色（silver） 反射 700 1200
白色（white） 寒冷抵抗 500 900
黄色（yellow） 强酸抵抗 500 900

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（NetHack 3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

新增防具金龙鳞甲（gold dragon scale mail）：其会在穿戴时发光，并赋予幻觉抵抗。此外，部分龙鳞甲现在能赋予额外的特质[4]。

3.7.0的龙鳞甲赋予的特质见下表：
颜色 特质（NetHack 3.7.0）
蓝色 电击抵抗、非常快速
黑色 分解抵抗、降级抵抗
灰色 魔法抵抗
绿色 毒素抵抗、疾病抵抗
金色 光源、幻觉抵抗
橙色 睡眠抵抗、自由行动
红色 火焰抵抗、红外视觉
银色 反射
白色 寒冷抵抗、慢消化
黄色 强酸抵抗、石化抵抗

变形

穿戴龙鳞或龙鳞甲时，无控制的变形将会导致穿戴者变成与其同色的龙。无论以何种方式变成和身穿的龙甲同色的龙，龙甲都会变回龙鳞并融入你身上的鳞片[5][6]，但附魔值仍保留。如果龙鳞的附魔值为+3或更高，它有可能在你试图把它变成龙鳞甲时蒸发。在变形的状态下，龙鳞在你的物品栏里会标注“(嵌在你的皮肤里)”，且不会发挥其正常的防护效果，其基础AC和附魔加成均不会影响你变形状态下的AC，也不会被防具附魔卷轴选中。你的衬衫和斗篷会照常被撕裂。如果你在龙形态下再次变形，你可能会变成其他大型怪物，并在此过程中摧毁龙鳞。

变形物品时，龙鳞甲会被认为是魔法物品，但龙鳞不是。

由于龙鳞和龙鳞甲均不会随机生成，它们不能通过批量变形来获取。

策略

龙鳞甲是NetHack中最强的防具之一：它提供最高的AC加成，重量仅有40，其材料天然免疫所有侵蚀损伤，而且不阻碍施法。即使龙鳞甲提供的特质并非玩家所需要的，前述的优点也使得它比绝大多数铠甲要实用。龙鳞甲唯一的缺点是不提供销魔加成，因此最好搭配其他高MC的防具使用。

获取龙鳞和龙鳞甲

有两种主要的方法来获得龙鳞甲：直接许愿来获得，或是杀死龙获得龙鳞，并用龙鳞制作龙鳞甲。在英文版本游戏中许愿时，务必确保拼写正确，否则你很可能得到“scroll of mail”。

还有另外两种方法获得龙鳞甲。一种是通过骨档获取，这种方法运气成分较大。另一种是杀死星界位面的玩家怪物来获取，这种方法基本没什么实用性，因为有实力走到星界的玩家通常已经拿到龙鳞甲了。

用龙鳞制作龙鳞甲

龙鳞甲可以轻而易举地用龙鳞制作出来：

  1. 仅穿戴你需要转化的龙鳞
  2. 阅读一张非诅咒的防具附魔卷轴

成功后，龙鳞会被转化为同色的龙鳞甲。

如果卷轴是受祝福的，龙鳞甲会变成被祝福的，且附魔等级+1。请注意，如果龙鳞的附魔等级已经超过+3，它可能会像其他防具那样蒸发。

获取龙鳞

获取龙鳞甲很简单：杀死你需要的颜色的龙，直到有龙鳞掉落，然后依照上文的描述制作龙鳞甲。

每只龙掉落龙鳞的概率是1⁄3，但如果龙是复生的，则掉落概率降到1⁄20[1]。

搭配魔法陷阱或圣洁的冠冕这样的能量来源，你可以利用超度法术来反复刷同一只龙以获取龙鳞。

生成龙有以下几种方法：

  1. 在变形陷阱上变形你的宠物来让它变成你需要的龙，然后抛弃它，直到它变回野生（也可以以降低幸运值为代价，直接杀死它）。
  2. 反向灭绝龙。
  3. 让阵营合适的怪物施放召唤恶物，直到你需要的龙出现（注意，这不会生成蓝色、灰色或白色的龙）。务必准备好应对其他有可能被召唤出来的怪物！
  4. 变成你需要的颜色的雌性龙，生几个蛋（使用坐下命令），让它们孵化，然后等它们成长为成年龙。利用怪物的被动攻击或陷阱杀死它们可以避免惩罚。
  5. 击杀城堡、吕底人堡垒及部分任务关卡里必定生成的龙。
  6. 地牢深层的王座房间里也可能生成龙。如果玩家在混乱状态下搜刮王座，它也有可能生成龙，不过要注意，王座每次被搜刮都会有1⁄10的概率变为无法被搜刮的状态。

灰还是银？

主条目：灰龙鳞甲VS银龙鳞甲

灰龙鳞甲（gray dragon scale mail，简称“GDSM”）和银龙鳞甲（silver dragon scale mail，简称“SDSM”）通常被认为是最实用的两种龙鳞甲，但在不同情景下，哪种龙鳞甲更应当优先获取一直是玩家们争论的问题。灰龙甲提供魔法抵抗，可以抵御怪物法术和变形陷阱的效果；银龙甲提供反射，可以抵御魔杖、喷吐等射线效果。因为两种属性都很有用，最好先找到一个能提供魔抗或反射的来源，再去获取能提供另一个特质的龙鳞甲。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

新版本中，龙鳞甲提供的特质更多样了，因此选取策略也可能因此改变。

其他颜色

一般来说，玩家都会选择灰色或银色龙甲。不过，极少数情况下也有其他龙甲适合选择：

  • 无许愿飞升：你当然可以通过反向灭绝获取龙鳞甲，但也有运气不好，既找不到卷轴也找不到魔笔的情况，这时最好先把你找到的第一件龙鳞做成龙鳞甲穿上，因为你需要它提供的AC加成和减负。
  • 无食物或素食主义者飞升：虽然无食物行为玩家可以通过加冕获取绝大多数的抗性，这有时也是可遇不可求的（如果你同时还挑战无神论者的话，那就完全不能用这个手段）。龙鳞甲提供的其他特质有时也是玩家需要的（特别是已经从其他来源获取了魔抗和反射的时候）。使用龙鳞甲获取抗性比起戒指还有一个优势，那就是龙鳞甲不需要鉴定。最优先考虑的龙甲有三种：
    • 红龙鳞甲：保护玩家免受葛汉诺姆的火焰陷阱伤害，功能可被戒指覆盖。
    • 绿龙鳞甲：保护玩家免受尖刺坑、淬毒发射物和剧毒近战攻击的影响，功能可被炼金术罩衫、对应的护身符或戒指覆盖，部分角色天生或升级后自带毒抗。
    • 橙龙鳞甲：提供睡眠抗性，保护玩家免受睡眠效果的陷阱、魔杖或投掷药水的影响。精灵升到4级就会获得该特质，但其他角色无法通过自由行动戒指覆盖其功能，因此该龙鳞甲有一定实用性。
  • 如果你实在是不喜欢遭受强酸攻击：若没有自我变形手段或炼金术罩衫，黄龙鳞甲是唯一提供酸抗的来源。不过酸性攻击事实上威胁也不大。
  • 黑龙鳞甲是唯一能够提供分解抵抗的外在来源，它可以保护玩家不受黑龙分解射线的影响。不过，反射特质也可以抵御射线攻击，而且分解特质也能通过食用黑龙的尸体获取。

宠物与龙鳞甲

人形宠物也可以穿戴龙鳞甲，根据不同宠物的特点和它们具备的抗性，适合它们的龙鳞甲选择也有所不同：

  • 夺心魔的多段攻击会触发多次怪物的被动攻击效果，因此适合穿戴黄龙鳞甲来抵御酸性怪物的被动攻击。
  • 如果你没有多余的反射来源给宠物使用，可以考虑给宠物穿黑龙鳞甲来抵御黑龙的分解射线。

历史

龙鳞甲最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。到NetHack 3.0.10版本为止，玩家需要通过变形龙的尸体来将其转化为对应颜色的龙鳞甲，且游戏中只有一种龙鳞甲，其提供火焰抵抗。

龙鳞最初于NetHack 3.1.0加入游戏，同时加入了颜色和特质加成不同的龙甲（银色除外），并引入了现版本龙鳞甲的制作方法。银龙鳞及银龙鳞甲于NetHack 3.3.0加入。

Variants

Main article: Dragon-scaled armor

In some variants, dragon scale mail is phased out in favor of dragon-scaled armor, whose implementation is based on a proposal by dtsund. Instead of being made into mail of its own, the dragon scales are treated as a cloak, and reading a scroll of enchant armor melds them onto a worn set of body armor, generally augmenting that armor by adding its AC and conferred extrinsic properties to it.

Scrolls of enchant armor will always target worn dragon scales instead of other worn items: a blessed scroll will bless the body armor that the scales are melded to and repair any erosion (but will not erodeproof it), while a cursed scroll will cursed the body armor and lower its enchantment by 1 point. If the armor is already dragon-scaled, fusing another set of scales replaces the previous color. If reading a scroll of enchant armor while wearing scales without body armor, your character will polymorph into the matching type of dragon, with polymorph control allowing you to choose whether to transfor - if read while confused and wearing both scales and body armor, the scales fuse into the armor before your character polymorphs into a dragon.

Dragon-scaled armor is implemented in NetHack Fourk, xNetHack, EvilHack, and Hack'EM - these implementations differ from the proposal and from each other, and are covered in detail by the article linked above.

Several variants also give dragon scale mail additional properties while worn, and may even introduce other forms of dragon scale armor. Variants with object properties and/or partial intrinsics can also shift the use of other colors of dragon scale mail as well, generally creating more useful options.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces two new types of dragons, and thus two types of dragon scales and dragon scale mail:

Color Extrinsic
Shimmering displacement
Deep drain resistance

SLASH'EM also makes several changes with regards to how dragon scale mail can be made or obtained:

  • Baby dragons are more common to encounter in the dungeon, but take much longer to grow up into adult form, and polymorphing for monsters works as it does for the player character, meaning that pets cannot be polymorphed for their death drops.
  • The Wyrm Caves guarantees the appearance of several dragons within the level, providing a plentiful source of various scales.
  • Shopkeeper services from used armor dealerships may include the ability to enchant armor - this allows another method besides wishing for illiterate characters to obtain dragon scale mail, though only 1⁄4 of such shopkeepers offer it.
  • There are sources of guaranteed gray dragon scales/dragon scale mail in the Lawful Quest and the black market, respectively, though both are quite difficult to liberate from their owners.
  • Some gnolls can be generated with dragon scale mail:
    • Gnoll warriors have a 1⁄20 chance of receiving orange dragon scale mail.[7]
    • Gnoll chieftains have a 1⁄10 chance of blue dragon scale mail.[8]
    • Gnoll shamans have a 1⁄10 chance of silver dragon scale mail, and otherwise have a 1⁄5 chance of generating with red dragon scale mail.[9]

Though gray and silver are still popular colors of dragon scale mail, strategic uses of other colors are more common as well, especially for characters that seek to obtain magic resistance and reflection by other means: SLASH'EM features several more level-draining threats, such as the wand of draining and the breath weapon of deep dragons; shimmering dragons are tougher to hit than other monsters, while making displacement obtainable without sacrificing the cloak slot typically used for MC3; stronger acidic threats such as the shoggoth and giant shoggoth make yellow dragon scale mail's acid resistance much more viable as well.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, dragon scale mail weighs 250 aum and provides 8 AC.

GruntHack

GruntHack's implementation of object properties makes it possible for dragon scale mail and other magical items to have an additional property, unlike implementations of object properties in later variants. Since it is possible and commonplace to wish for an item that provides both magic resistance and reflection (e.g. usually "blessed greased +3 dragonhide cloak of magic resistance and reflection"), the remaining properties are usually covered via other wishes.

The result is that the choice between gray and silver dragon mail (or most other colors) for wishes is rendered moot: assuming a first wish to cover both magic resistance and reflection such as the example provided, yellow dragon scale mail of decay (which adds drain resistance) is the most common secondary wish for most characters, as it blocks two of the most pressing remaining threats: drain life and acid blast, which hostile spellcasters of certain levels can have access to. Most characters that obtain wishes can also tailor their dragon mail choices to fit other desired builds - characters playing races that cannot wear body armor, such as giants, will have to consider a different series of wishes altogether for their property coverage.

SporkHack

SporkHack adds gold dragon scale mail, which act as a permanent light source while worn. Most sets of dragon scales and dragon scale mail are also given a secondary extrinsic:

Color Extrinsic Secondary extrinsic
Blue shock resistance speed
Black disintegration resistance passive blinding attack
Gold light source none
Gray magic resistance none
Green poison resistance passive poison attack
Orange sleep resistance passive slow attack
Red fire resistance +1d6 to all melee damage
Silver reflection none
White cold resistance freezes water and lava under foot
Yellow acid resistance stun and confusion resistance

dNetHack

Main article: Dragon armor (dNetHack)

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, dragon scales can made into dragon scale shields as well as dragon scale mail - reading a scroll of enchant armor while confused will harden worn dragon scales into a shield. All dragon armor and corresponding scales are given one or more secondary properties similar to SporkHack and other variants, with some being exclusive to particular types of scales or armor. Dragon scales and dragon scale mail also weigh 150 aum. Deep dragons and shimmering dragons are added along with their scales and armor.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, dragon scale mail confers only 5 base AC. The powers of dragons and their scales (and thus scale mails) are also randomized in each game:

Appearances Powers (randomized each game)
tatzelworm "magic"
amphitere "reflecting"
draken "fire"
lindworm "ice"
sarkany "sleep"
sirrush "disintegration"
leviathan "electric"
wyvern "poison"
glowing* "stone"**
guivre "acid"
chromatic all

A glowing dragon will always emit light within a 2-square radius of itself - glowing dragon scales (and glowing dragon scale mail) do the same while worn. The dragon that produces stone dragon scales will always have a breath weapon that creates lava.

UnNetHack also makes significant changes to wishing rules: In particular, wands of wishing only have 0-2 charges (plus 1 wrest), and only wishes from wands can be used for magical items such as dragon scale mail, magic markers, scrolls of genocide, and scrolls of enchant armor.

Dragon scales are still non-magical items as in NetHack, and can be obtained from any wish source in UnNetHack - any set of dragon scales can be wished for by appearance (e.g. wishing for "guivre scales", or "guivre scale mail" from a wand of wishing, will always work). To wish for dragon armor by its corresponding power, the armor must be formally identified first, e.g. by using a scroll of identify on dropped dragon scales (which identifies the matching scale mail along with it) or by witnessing the dragon use its breath weapon. The name of the power can then be used in the wish, e.g. "reflecting dragon scale mail".

FIQHack

FIQHack implements the shimmering dragon and its scales (and scale mail). Dragon scale mail now weighs 300 aum, and the weight of all worn armor is halved.

Dragon scale mail (and corresponding scales) confers additional benefits while worn:

Color Extrinsic Secondary extrinsic
Blue shock resistance speed, slowing resistance
Black disintegration resistance drain resistance
Gray magic resistance none
Green poison resistance sickness resistance
Orange sleep resistance free action

xNetHack

In xNetHack's implementation of dtsund-DSM, the additional extrinsics that were added to most scales in 3.7.0 only apply to dragon-scaled armor and not to the scales by themselves.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM's implementation of dtsund-DSM, dragon-scaled armor provides an additional extrinsic and a passive attack. In the table below, a set of scales provides only the primary extrinsic, while a suit of dragon-scaled armor provides all three benefits. |cost=500{{波浪线}}700 |weight=40 |material=龙皮 }} '''龙鳞甲'''（dragon scale mail，通常缩写为'''DSM'''）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一类[[铠甲]]类[[防具]]。 '''龙鳞'''（dragon scales）是一种与龙鳞甲性质相似的[[铠甲]]。 两种铠甲均由[[龙皮]]制成。 == 生成 == 龙鳞和龙鳞甲均不会随机生成。但玩家可以通过[[许愿]]或[[骨档]]获取它们。 成年的[[龙]]如果被能够留下[[尸体]]的方式杀死（如果被[[分解]]，则不会留下尸体），则有{{frac|3}}的概率掉落一块与之同色的龙鳞。利用[[超度魔杖]]或{{+ of/zh-CN|超度}}法术复生的龙仅有{{frac|20}}的概率掉落龙鳞{{refsrc|src/mon.c|325|version=NetHack 3.6.7|name=scalegen}}。所有由龙掉落的龙鳞都是+0附魔且未诅咒的{{refsrc|src/mon.c|328|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 若玩家在穿戴龙鳞时阅读非诅咒的[[防具附魔卷轴]]，且卷轴选择了龙鳞为目标，则龙鳞会被转化为同色的龙鳞甲。如果卷轴是祝福的，龙鳞甲的附魔等级+1。 在[[星界位面]]生成，且非[[僧侣（玩家怪物）|僧侣]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]有{{frac|9}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件随机颜色的龙鳞甲{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|156|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == === 基础属性 === 龙鳞的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为3，不提供{{cnlink|MC}}加成，但会根据其颜色提供一项特质加成。 龙鳞甲的效果与同色的龙鳞基本相同，但基础AC加成为9。 === 颜色 === 下表展示各颜色的龙鳞和龙鳞甲对应的外在特质加成和基础价： {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0;" ! 颜色 !! 外在特质 !! 基础价（龙鳞） !! 基础价（龙鳞甲） |- | 蓝色（blue） || [[电击抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |- | 黑色（black） || [[分解抵抗]] || 700 || 1200 |- | 灰色（gray） || [[魔法抵抗]] || 700 || 1200 |- | 绿色（green） || [[毒素抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |- | 橙色（orange） || [[睡眠抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |- | 红色（red） || [[火焰抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |- | 银色（silver） || [[反射]] || 700 || 1200 |- | 白色（white） || [[寒冷抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |- | 黄色（yellow） || [[强酸抵抗]] || 500 || 900 |} {{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|新增防具[[金龙]]鳞甲（gold dragon scale mail）：其会在穿戴时发[[光]]，并赋予[[幻觉抵抗]]。此外，部分龙鳞甲现在能赋予额外的特质https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/ef1eeed7550e38fa1e4ff0ef608f3c8b55eaa950。 3.7.0的龙鳞甲赋予的特质见下表：}} {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0;" ! 颜色 !! 特质（NetHack 3.7.0） |- | 蓝色 || [[电击抵抗]]、[[非常快速]] |- | 黑色 || [[分解抵抗]]、[[降级抵抗]] |- | 灰色 || [[魔法抵抗]] |- | 绿色 || [[毒素抵抗]]、[[疾病抵抗]] |- | 金色 || [[光源]]、[[幻觉抵抗]] |- | 橙色 || [[睡眠抵抗]]、[[自由行动]] |- | 红色 || [[火焰抵抗]]、[[红外视觉]] |- | 银色 || [[反射]] |- | 白色 || [[寒冷抵抗]]、[[慢消化]] |- | 黄色 || [[强酸抵抗]]、[[石化抵抗]] |} === 变形 === 穿戴龙鳞或龙鳞甲时，无控制的[[变形]]将会导致穿戴者变成与其同色的龙。无论以何种方式变成和身穿的龙甲同色的龙，龙甲都会变回龙鳞并融入你身上的鳞片{{refsrc|src/polyself.c|501|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/polyself.c|518|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}，但附魔值仍保留。如果龙鳞的附魔值为+3或更高，它有可能在你试图把它变成龙鳞甲时蒸发。在变形的状态下，龙鳞在你的物品栏里会标注“(嵌在你的皮肤里)”，且不会发挥其正常的防护效果，其基础AC和附魔加成均不会影响你变形状态下的AC，也不会被[[防具附魔卷轴]]选中。你的[[衬衫]]和[[斗篷]]会照常被撕裂。如果你在龙形态下再次变形，你可能会变成其他大型怪物，并在此过程中摧毁龙鳞。 变形物品时，龙鳞甲会被认为是[[魔法物品]]，但龙鳞不是。 由于龙鳞和龙鳞甲均不会随机生成，它们不能通过[[批量变形]]来获取。 == 策略 == 龙鳞甲是NetHack中最强的[[防具]]之一：它提供最高的AC加成，[[重量]]仅有40，其材料天然免疫所有[[侵蚀损伤]]，而且不阻碍[[施法]]。即使龙鳞甲提供的特质并非玩家所需要的，前述的优点也使得它比绝大多数铠甲要实用。龙鳞甲唯一的缺点是不提供[[销魔]]加成，因此最好搭配其他高MC的防具使用。 === 获取龙鳞和龙鳞甲 === 有两种主要的方法来获得龙鳞甲：直接[[许愿]]来获得，或是杀死龙获得龙鳞，并用龙鳞制作龙鳞甲。在英文版本游戏中许愿时，务必确保拼写正确，否则你很可能得到“{{cnlink|scroll of mail}}”。 还有另外两种方法获得龙鳞甲。一种是通过[[骨档]]获取，这种方法运气成分较大。另一种是杀死[[星界位面]]的[[玩家怪物]]来获取，这种方法基本没什么实用性，因为有实力走到星界的玩家通常已经拿到龙鳞甲了。 ==== 用龙鳞制作龙鳞甲 ==== 龙鳞甲可以轻而易举地用龙鳞制作出来： # 仅[[穿戴]]你需要转化的龙鳞 # [[阅读]]一张非诅咒的[[防具附魔卷轴]] 成功后，龙鳞会被转化为同色的龙鳞甲。 如果卷轴是受祝福的，龙鳞甲会变成被祝福的，且附魔等级+1。请注意，如果龙鳞的附魔等级已经超过+3，它可能会像其他防具那样蒸发。 ==== 获取龙鳞 ==== 获取龙鳞甲很简单：杀死你需要的颜色的龙，直到有龙鳞掉落，然后依照[[#用龙鳞制作龙鳞甲|上文]]的描述制作龙鳞甲。 每只龙掉落龙鳞的概率是{{frac|3}}，但如果龙是[[复生]]的，则掉落概率降到{{frac|20}}。 搭配[[魔法陷阱]]或[[圣洁的冠冕]]这样的能量来源，你可以利用{{+ of/zh-CN|超度}}法术来反复刷同一只龙以获取龙鳞。 生成龙有以下几种方法： # 在[[变形陷阱]]上[[变形]]你的[[宠物]]来让它变成你需要的龙，然后抛弃它，直到它变回[[驯服度|野生]]（也可以以[[幸运#改变幸运值的方法|降低幸运值]]为代价，直接杀死它）。 # [[反向灭绝]]龙。 # 让[[阵营#怪物阵营|阵营]]合适的怪物施放[[召唤恶物]]，直到你需要的龙出现（注意，这不会生成蓝色、灰色或白色的龙）。务必准备好应对其他有可能被召唤出来的怪物！ # 变成你需要的颜色的雌性龙，生几个蛋（使用[[坐下]]命令），让它们孵化，然后等它们成长为成年龙。利用怪物的被动攻击或陷阱杀死它们可以避免惩罚。 # 击杀[[城堡]]、[[吕底人堡垒]]及部分[[任务]]关卡里必定生成的龙。 # 地牢深层的[[王座房间]]里也可能生成龙。如果玩家在[[混乱]]状态下[[搜刮]][[王座]]，它也有可能生成龙，不过要注意，王座每次被搜刮都会有{{frac|10}}的概率变为无法被搜刮的状态。 如果你想通过反向灭绝生成龙，但自身实力不足以对付它们，你可以利用如下所示的“笼战”来对付它们。

如果你已经抵达了[[城堡]]，带有存放[[许愿魔杖]]的[[箱子]]的房间会在地面上生成一张恐吓怪物卷轴（它是被诅咒的，因此不要捡起来）。你可以如上图例所示，将它用作对付龙群的战场。房间中有两处龙能对你使用喷吐攻击的位置，你可以按图例所示用巨石堵住（可以利用[[仓库番]]的[[大地卷轴]]）。此处的墙不可挖掘，因此你不用担心战场布置被挖洞怪物破坏。 [[仓库番]]中生成的恐吓怪物卷轴也可以利用，你需要先在下面挖个[[洞]]让卷轴落到下层来利用它，而且要能落到可以用[[巨石堡垒]]圈出合适的战场的地方。如果没有，你可以[[踢]]卷轴来把它转移到合适的位置（它会在碰到墙或怪物时停下），或者再挖个洞让它掉到更下层（除非它已经掉到最下层了）。 === 灰还是银？ === {{main/zh-CN|灰龙鳞甲VS银龙鳞甲}} 灰龙鳞甲（gray dragon scale mail，简称“GDSM”）和银龙鳞甲（silver dragon scale mail，简称“SDSM”）通常被认为是最实用的两种龙鳞甲，但在不同情景下，哪种龙鳞甲更应当优先获取一直是玩家们争论的问题。灰龙甲提供[[魔法抵抗]]，可以抵御[[怪物法术]]和[[变形陷阱]]的效果；银龙甲提供[[反射]]，可以抵御魔杖、喷吐等[[射线]]效果。因为两种属性都很有用，最好先找到一个能提供魔抗或反射的来源，再去获取能提供另一个特质的龙鳞甲。 {{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|新版本中，龙鳞甲提供的特质更多样了，因此选取策略也可能因此改变。}} === 其他颜色 === 一般来说，玩家都会选择灰色或银色龙甲。不过，极少数情况下也有其他龙甲适合选择： * [[无许愿]]飞升：你当然可以通过反向灭绝获取龙鳞甲，但也有运气不好，既找不到卷轴也找不到魔笔的情况，这时最好先把你找到的第一件龙鳞做成龙鳞甲穿上，因为你需要它提供的AC加成和减负。 * [[无食物]]或[[素食主义者]]飞升：虽然无食物行为玩家可以通过[[加冕]]获取绝大多数的抗性，这有时也是可遇不可求的（如果你同时还挑战[[无神论者]]的话，那就完全不能用这个手段）。龙鳞甲提供的其他特质有时也是玩家需要的（特别是已经从其他来源获取了魔抗和反射的时候）。使用龙鳞甲获取抗性比起戒指还有一个优势，那就是龙鳞甲不需要鉴定。最优先考虑的龙甲有三种： ** 红龙鳞甲：保护玩家免受[[葛汉诺姆]]的[[火焰陷阱]]伤害，功能可被[[火抗戒指|戒指]]覆盖。 ** 绿龙鳞甲：保护玩家免受尖刺坑、淬毒发射物和剧毒近战攻击的影响，功能可被[[炼金术罩衫]]、对应的[[毒抗护身符|护身符]]或[[毒抗戒指|戒指]]覆盖，部分角色天生或升级后自带毒抗。 ** 橙龙鳞甲：提供[[睡眠抗性]]，保护玩家免受睡眠效果的陷阱、魔杖或投掷药水的影响。精灵升到4级就会获得该特质，但其他角色无法通过[[自由行动戒指]]覆盖其功能，因此该龙鳞甲有一定实用性。 * 如果你实在是不喜欢遭受强酸攻击：若没有自我[[变形]]手段或[[炼金术罩衫]]，黄龙鳞甲是唯一提供酸抗的来源。不过酸性攻击事实上威胁也不大。 * 黑龙鳞甲是唯一能够提供分解抵抗的外在来源，它可以保护玩家不受[[黑龙]]分解射线的影响。不过，反射特质也可以抵御射线攻击，而且分解特质也能通过食用黑龙的尸体获取。 === 宠物与龙鳞甲 === 人形宠物也可以穿戴龙鳞甲，根据不同宠物的特点和它们具备的抗性，适合它们的龙鳞甲选择也有所不同： * [[夺心魔]]的多段攻击会触发多次怪物的被动攻击效果，因此适合穿戴黄龙鳞甲来抵御酸性怪物的被动攻击。 * 如果你没有多余的反射来源给宠物使用，可以考虑给宠物穿黑龙鳞甲来抵御黑龙的分解射线。 == 历史 == 龙鳞甲最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。到[[NetHack 3.0.10]]版本为止，玩家需要通过变形龙的尸体来将其转化为对应颜色的龙鳞甲，且游戏中只有一种龙鳞甲，其提供火焰抵抗。 龙鳞最初于[[NetHack 3.1.0]]加入游戏，同时加入了颜色和特质加成不同的龙甲（银色除外），并引入了现版本龙鳞甲的制作方法。银龙鳞及银龙鳞甲于[[NetHack 3.3.0]]加入。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} {{main|Dragon-scaled armor}} In some variants, dragon scale mail is phased out in favor of dragon-scaled armor, whose implementation is based on a proposal by dtsund. Instead of being made into mail of its own, the dragon scales are treated as a [[cloak]], and reading a scroll of enchant armor melds them onto a worn set of body armor, generally augmenting that armor by adding its AC and conferred extrinsic properties to it. Scrolls of enchant armor will always target worn dragon scales instead of other worn items: a blessed scroll will bless the body armor that the scales are melded to and repair any erosion (but will not erodeproof it), while a cursed scroll will cursed the body armor and lower its enchantment by 1 point. If the armor is already dragon-scaled, fusing another set of scales replaces the previous color. If reading a scroll of enchant armor while wearing scales without body armor, your character will polymorph into the matching type of dragon, with [[polymorph control]] allowing you to choose whether to transfor - if read while confused and wearing both scales and body armor, the scales fuse into the armor before your character polymorphs into a dragon. Dragon-scaled armor is implemented in [[NetHack Fourk]], [[xNetHack]], [[EvilHack]], and [[Hack'EM]] - these implementations differ from the proposal and from each other, and are covered in detail by the article linked above. Several variants also give dragon scale mail additional properties while worn, and may even introduce other forms of dragon scale armor. Variants with [[object properties]] and/or partial intrinsics can also shift the use of other colors of dragon scale mail as well, generally creating more useful options. ===SLASH'EM=== [[SLASH'EM]] introduces two new types of dragons, and thus two types of dragon scales and dragon scale mail: {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0;" !Color !! Extrinsic |- |[[Shimmering dragon scale mail|Shimmering]]||[[displacement]] |- |[[Deep dragon scale mail|Deep]]||[[drain resistance]] |} SLASH'EM also makes several changes with regards to how dragon scale mail can be made or obtained: * [[Baby dragon]]s are more common to encounter in the dungeon, but take much longer to [[grow up]] into adult form, and polymorphing for monsters works as it does for the player character, meaning that pets cannot be polymorphed for their death drops. * [[The Wyrm Caves]] guarantees the appearance of several dragons within the level, providing a plentiful source of various scales. * [[Shopkeeper services]] from used armor [[Shop|dealerships]] may include the ability to enchant armor - this allows another method besides wishing for [[illiterate]] characters to obtain dragon scale mail, though only {{frac|4}} of such [[shopkeeper]]s offer it. * There are sources of guaranteed gray dragon scales/dragon scale mail in the [[Lawful Quest]] and [[Black market (SLASH'EM)#One-eyed Sam|the black market]], respectively, though both are quite difficult to liberate from their owners. * Some [[gnoll]]s can be generated with dragon scale mail: ** [[Gnoll warrior]]s have a {{frac|20}} chance of receiving orange dragon scale mail.{{refsrc|makemon.c|691|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} ** [[Gnoll chieftain]]s have a {{frac|10}} chance of blue dragon scale mail.{{refsrc|makemon.c|705|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} ** [[Gnoll shaman]]s have a {{frac|10}} chance of silver dragon scale mail, and otherwise have a {{frac|5}} chance of generating with red dragon scale mail.{{refsrc|makemon.c|718|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} Though gray and silver are still popular colors of dragon scale mail, strategic uses of other colors are more common as well, especially for characters that seek to obtain magic resistance and reflection by other means: SLASH'EM features several more level-draining threats, such as the [[wand of draining]] and the breath weapon of [[deep dragon]]s; [[shimmering dragon]]s are tougher to hit than other monsters, while making displacement obtainable without sacrificing the [[cloak]] slot typically used for [[Magic cancellation (3.4.3)|MC3]]; stronger acidic threats such as the [[Shoggoth (SLASH'EM)|shoggoth]] and [[giant shoggoth]] make yellow dragon scale mail's acid resistance much more viable as well. ===NetHack brass=== In [[NetHack brass]], dragon scale mail weighs 250 aum and provides 8 AC. ===GruntHack=== [[GruntHack]]'s implementation of [[object properties]] makes it possible for dragon scale mail and other magical items to have an additional property, unlike implementations of object properties in later variants. Since it is possible and commonplace to wish for an item that provides both magic resistance and reflection (e.g. usually "blessed greased +3 dragonhide [[cloak of magic resistance]] and reflection"), the remaining properties are usually covered via other wishes. The result is that the choice between gray and silver dragon mail (or most other colors) for wishes is rendered moot: assuming a first wish to cover both magic resistance and reflection such as the example provided, yellow dragon scale mail of decay (which adds drain resistance) is the most common secondary wish for most characters, as it blocks two of the most pressing remaining threats: {{spell of|drain life}} and {{spell of|acid blast}}, which hostile spellcasters of certain levels can have access to. Most characters that obtain wishes can also tailor their dragon mail choices to fit other desired builds - characters playing races that cannot wear body armor, such as [[Giant (starting race)|giants]], will have to consider a different series of wishes altogether for their property coverage. ===SporkHack=== [[SporkHack]] adds [[gold dragon scale mail]], which act as a permanent light source while worn. Most sets of dragon scales and dragon scale mail are also given a secondary extrinsic: {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0;" !Color !! Extrinsic !! Secondary extrinsic |- |[[Blue dragon scale mail|Blue]]||[[shock resistance]]||[[speed]] |- |[[Black dragon scale mail|Black]]||[[disintegration resistance]]||passive blinding attack |- |[[Gold dragon scale mail|Gold]]||[[light source]]||none |- |[[Gray dragon scale mail|Gray]]||[[magic resistance]]||none |- |[[Green dragon scale mail|Green]]||[[poison resistance]]||passive [[poison]] attack |- |[[Orange dragon scale mail|Orange]]||[[sleep resistance]]||passive slow attack |- |[[Red dragon scale mail|Red]]||[[fire resistance]]||+1d6 to all melee damage |- |[[Silver dragon scale mail|Silver]]||[[reflection]]||none |- |[[White dragon scale mail|White]]||[[cold resistance]]||freezes water and lava under foot |- |[[Yellow dragon scale mail|Yellow]]||[[acid resistance]]||stun and confusion resistance |} ===dNetHack=== {{main|Dragon armor (dNetHack)}} In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], dragon scales can made into dragon scale shields as well as dragon scale mail - reading a scroll of enchant armor while confused will harden worn dragon scales into a shield. All dragon armor and corresponding scales are given one or more secondary properties similar to SporkHack and other variants, with some being exclusive to particular types of scales or armor. Dragon scales and dragon scale mail also weigh 150 aum. [[Deep dragon (dNetHack)|Deep dragons]] and [[Shimmering dragon (dNetHack)|shimmering dragons]] are added along with their scales and armor. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], dragon scale mail confers only 5 base AC. The powers of dragons and their scales (and thus scale mails) are also randomized in each game: {|class="prettytable" ! Appearances !! Powers (randomized each game) |- | tatzelworm || "[[magic resistance|magic]]" |- | amphitere || "[[reflection|reflecting]]" |- | draken || "[[fire resistance|fire]]" |- | lindworm || "[[cold resistance|ice]]" |- | sarkany || "[[sleep resistance|sleep]]" |- | sirrush || "[[disintegration resistance|disintegration]]" |- | leviathan || "[[shock resistance|electric]]" |- | wyvern || "[[poison resistance|poison]]" |- | glowing* || "[[stoning resistance|stone]]"** |- | guivre || "[[acid resistance|acid]]" |- | [[chromatic dragon (UnNetHack)|chromatic]] || all |} A glowing dragon will always [[Light source|emit light]] within a 2-square radius of itself - [[glowing dragon scales]] (and [[glowing dragon scale mail]]) do the same while worn. The dragon that produces [[stone dragon scales]] will always have a breath weapon that creates lava. UnNetHack also makes significant changes to [[Wish#UnNetHack|wishing rules]]: In particular, [[Wand of wishing#UnNetHack|wands of wishing]] only have 0-2 charges (plus 1 [[wresting|wrest]]), and only wishes from wands can be used for magical items such as dragon scale mail, [[magic marker]]s, [[scroll of genocide|scrolls of genocide]], and scrolls of enchant armor. Dragon scales are still non-magical items as in ''NetHack'', and can be obtained from any wish source in UnNetHack - any set of dragon scales can be wished for by appearance (e.g. wishing for "guivre scales", or "guivre scale mail" from a wand of wishing, will always work). To wish for dragon armor by its corresponding power, the armor must be formally identified first, e.g. by using a [[scroll of identify]] on dropped dragon scales (which identifies the matching scale mail along with it) or by witnessing the dragon use its breath weapon. The name of the power can then be used in the wish, e.g. "''reflecting'' dragon scale mail". ===FIQHack=== [[FIQHack]] implements the [[Shimmering dragon (FIQHack)|shimmering dragon]] and its scales (and scale mail). Dragon scale mail now weighs 300 aum, and the weight of all worn armor is halved.
